Project.name: Augustin Soundtracks
Project.description: Soundtracks and arrangements that I have composed for a number of project over the years. Generally aimed as a hobby to help me better understand the fundamentals of music theory and composition. Most recently, the soundtrack to the unfinished visual novel series, Featherbent, which can be viewed here: https://featherbent.com/oldgames

Project.name: Project QVL
Project.description: A series of suburban photography that was done in the summer of 2010, with themes of nature and dream-like relaxation, using an old Kodak DX6490 with a CCD sensor to get those nostalgic colour tones.

Project.name: Culinary Work
Project.description: A few samples of the meals that I cooked and baked during my time as a Sous Chef at the Rotary Flames House.

Project.name: Warsaw Mountain
Project.description: A minimalist website display my poetry. I currently have two self-published collection of chapbooks and this is the start of working on my third by publishing one new piece per week.

Project.name: Notebook Casa
Project.description: A personal collection of essays I've written. A personal journey of lifelong learning, sharing resources, creating things, and trying to be better.

Project.name: Journal Bar
Project.description: This project is indended for me to provide weekly updates regarding my goals (systems) that I currently have on a website called Beeminder. Powered by Jekyll! I’ve decided to begin this meta-accountability experiement, where I’ll report my progress with my goals on this website weekly. I hope that this extra push of consistent reporting will help me succeed with my goals and stick to good habits.

Project.name: Pale Site
Project.description: An experimental website that takes heavy inspiration from the vaporwave movement, as well as translating the MACOS UI design into a website, with an API that pulls various artistic images (with sources) to
